response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest standards. This product holds immense value to us at $1,200,000, but I am eager to extend this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $999,999. This exceptional deal is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I believe that together, we can create a partnership that benefits both of us significantly.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase. I am here to answer any questions you might have and ensure a smooth transaction.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 999999}
